cell.name: praise_point
cell.val: Reddyamma who backslid from her faith has now come back to church. God delivered Sonu and Stephen from addiction of alcohol.

cell.name: prayer_point

cell.name: prayer_point

cell.name: prayer_point
cell.val: That the Backslidden believers will come back to their faith in God.

cell.val: God has healed Akshai from urinary tract infection and Santhosh, Mattami, Deepak, Isha, Reena, Seema and Aarthi from fever.

cell.name: prayer_point
cell.val: For the construction of the hostel compound wall.

cell.name: praise_point
cell.val: Two villages were reached with the Gospel and 38 people have confirmed their faith in Christ Jesus. Sunday worship service was started at Kosimsel village.

cell.name: prayer_point
cell.val: Even though the anti-Christian elements are obstructing our believers from conducting worship service in Vehelpada village they are strong in their faith. Pray that God will change the heart of the opposers. Rohini will be blessed with a child.

cell.name: praise_point
cell.val: Gospel was preached in seven villages. Six persons have yielded their lives to Jesus. Prayer meeting was started in Zhilpi village.

cell.name: prayer_point
cell.val: God to heal Bhaylal from paralysis. Deliverance of Kaluram from alcoholism,

cell.name: praise_point
cell.val: Women's and church elders meetings were conducted successfully. The family of Madavi and Vasanth are showing interest in the Gospel.

cell.name: prayer_point
cell.val: That the opposition will cease in this area. Believers will stand firm in their faith.

cell.name: praise_point
cell.val: Two villages were reached with the Gospel. God healed Gulab from snakebite. Jesus film was screened in Korpuna village.

cell.name: prayer_point
cell.val: New contacts of Raju, Laxmi, Monisha, Baby will know the love of Jesus Christ. The family problems of Vinod Atram will be solved.

cell.name: praise_point
cell.val: Four villages were reached with the Gospel. 78 people have yielded their lives to Christ.

cell.name: prayer_point
cell.val: Krishna Bhai who is disturbing our believers will know the love of Jesus Christ.

cell.name: praise_point
cell.val: God opened doors to preach the Gospel at Kardi and Torangam villages.

cell.val: Permission will be granted to construct church at Posera village.

cell.name: praise_point
cell.val: God has healed Kavitha from chest pain.

cell.name: prayer_point
cell.val: For the healing of Manjula Bhai from chickenguniya.

cell.name: prayer_point
cell.val: Muralidhar, Sittaram, Phyna and Rohini families would be blessed with child. Healing of Samuel and Sanchal from typhoid.

cell.name: praise_point
cell.val: Gospel has been proclaimed in eight villages. 101 have yielded their lives to Christ. Three days fasting prayers were conducted in Abhutbara, Amli and Satarpada villages.

cell.val: Churches to be built at Satarpada and Malangaon villages.

cell.name: praise_point
cell.val: Ten persons were added into His fold. Sensari church repair works were completed.

cell.name: prayer_point
cell.val: Runseth village people will know the Lord. God's healing touch on Rama from mental stress

cell.name: praise_point
cell.val: Gospel was preached in three villages. 36 people have confirmed their faith in Christ Jesus. The Lord enabled us to conduct three days fasting prayer in Kirmalaya village.

cell.name: prayer_point
cell.val: Sunder Bhai family will be blessed with a child. Local evangelists and missionaries will continue to serve the Lord with burden and passion.

cell.name: praise_point
cell.val: Gospel was preached in five villages. 25 people have confessed their faith in Christ Jesus. Jija Bai was handicapped for last ten years. Now after prayer she is able to stand.

cell.name: prayer_point
cell.val: God's help and guidance for us to translate the Bible in Khandeshi Bhili language. Newly reached villages will know the love of Jesus Christ

cell.name: praise_point
cell.val: God protected our missionaries during the heavy rains in Odisha.

cell.name: prayer_point
cell.val: Will get more new contacts from the forthcoming programs.

cell.name: praise_point
cell.val: Gospel was preached in four villages and eight persons were added into His fold. New believers' camp was conducted at Chandikamama and Kadudurama villages.

cell.val: God will heal Budni and Basanti from cancer. Takulu Sinku and Birju Sinku will know the love of Jesus Christ.

cell.val: Two villages were reached with the Gospel and five persons were added into His fold. Youth camp was conducted successfully at Bangursuni village.

cell.name: prayer_point
cell.val: Sanjile Munda will be healed from epilepsy. Tusu Munda and his family will know the love of Jesus Christ.

cell.name: praise_point
cell.val: Gospel has reached eight villages. 277 persons have turned to the Lord. Worship groups were formed in three places. God has healed Mitta who was critically ill through prayers.

cell.name: prayer_point
cell.val: Healing of Vijaya Kumar from tuberculosis. Kulvanth Singh, Narender Singh, Ramsingh and Binder Singh will allow their wives to attend the Sunday worship service. Preethi will be blessed with a child.

cell.name: praise_point
cell.val: Six villages were reached with the Gospel. 245 people have confirmed their faith in Christ Jesus. Congregations were formed in three places. Bhanto was healed from paralysis.

cell.val: Sethy and his wife to be united. Madhu will be blessed with a child. The construction of Church at Mandkalan village will be completed.

cell.val: Gospel has reached two villages. 100 people turned to the Lord. God healed Gurpreet from tuberculosis.

cell.val: Deliverance of Pavan Kumar Deli from alcoholism. Veerpaul Kour family will be blessed with a child. Buta Singh will get a good job.

cell.val: 26 people have confessed their faith in Christ Jesus. God healed Shantha Kour and Rathnamo Kour from asthma.

cell.val: Healing of Krishna from asthma and Edorobai from epilepsy. Asha will be blessed with child.

cell.val: Gospel was preached in six villages. Four persons were added into His fold. God protected Yesudian family from the two snakes in their house.

cell.val: The churches compound walls will be constructed in Paramanandal, Melpappampatti, Thanda and Reddiyarpalayam.Sivagangai was beaten by her husband as she came to church, he should know the love of Jesus.

cell.val: God to heal Marimuthu from cancer. Chinnamma family problems to be solved.

cell.name: praise_point
cell.val: 32 persons were added into His fold. Rubin's 8 year old son died but they are firm in their faith in Christ. Naresh, Vijay Kumar and Narendra are proclaiming Christ to others.

cell.val: New Testaments in Mundari, Assami and Odisha languages to be available on the right time for distribution. Through the Jesus film ministry many people will come into the fold of Christ.

cell.name: praise_point
cell.val: In 15 villages, Gospel has been proclaimed as a result 17 persons were brought to the fold of Christ. God blessed Sushila with a child and healed Sukuram from asthma.

cell.name: prayer_point
cell.val: Healing of Rajkali from typhoid and Gyanmati from elephantiasis.

cell.val: Gospel has been reached in 13 villages. 260 people have accepted Jesus Christ as their personal Savior. Worship groups were formed in ten villages. God enabled us preach the Gospel in Lucknow, Sitapur and Harthodi areas.

cell.val: : Arjun's family problems will be solved. Miracles and wonders will happen, for the people to know that Jesus is the living God.

cell.val: New believers to grow in their spiritual life.

cell.val: Six villages were reached with the Gospel. 33 people have yielded their lives to Christ. God protected Kishan from cobra snake bite.
